3. Maddipati Yesu Age 37 Years (Aadhaar No.XXXX XXXX XXXX) As per
the deed of immovable property jointly written.
You are our mother. Out of our love for you and in return for that love, we wish to bequeath to you some immovable property, and as per the schedule below, the immovable property is our ancestral property, that is, the property of Maddipati Venkateshu, your husband and our father, that is, the property of Maddipati Venkateshu, his brothers and their father, together in the year 1980. Before me, the property was inherited by Maddipati Venkatesu Garu and he had full ownership rights and enjoyed it as a darsala. Since he died, after his death, it has been inherited by us, his heirs, according to Hindu law, and since then we have had full ownership rights and enjoyed it in the said property. We hereby transfer the property to you free of charge and take full possession of it without any registration. You are the full right holders of the property and you, your sons and grandsons, will have full rights to donate, exchange and sell it and enjoy it freely. We hereby give you the assurance that we are not subject to any other encumbrances except by handing over the Scheduled Property to you in writing. The Scheduled Property is not land belonging to the Government of A.P. or its affiliated institutions. It is not land assigned by the Government of A.P. vide Act No. 9/77. Since the said land is vacant, no notices are hereby filed.
1.
M. Serinus versu Rav.
2. Maddipati Prasad Nishani

Section 22-B Registration Act - 1908
Declaration
This declaration is to inform that in the course of preparing this document, I/We have taken all the necessary documents such as the details of the property in the document, copies of the land title deeds, link deeds, tax receipts for the places and houses, details of the parties in the link document, addresses of the parties, photographs of the parties, details of the property etc. and have thoroughly examined all the elements and have included them in this document and have prepared the document. No matter that should have been written or included has been omitted in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been drawn up. I/We declare that the said property has not been sold, mortgaged, etc. to anyone else except for the purpose of this deed, that the said property is undisputed property, that there are no dues payable on the said property, and that I/We am/are able to pay the stamp duty found in the future by the authorities (Registration and Stamps Revenue Department) during the inspection of the said property. I/We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-3 of the Registration Act - 1908. And I/We take full responsibility for all other matters. Neither the Shri Sub-Registrar nor the clerk who prepared the deed has any connection with it. This Schedule property is not owned by the Government, the Vacancy Board and the Assignee and if it is found in the future and the investigation is carried out, we will be responsible for all such things. We have read this document completely and have given our full consent in writing.
Annexure III
Declaration
"I hereby declare that the property mentioned in the document belongs
to me and was not alienated earlier and if it is found to have been violated the
provisions of Section 22 B of Registration Act, 1908, I would be liable for
penal action as per Section 82 of Registration Act, 1908"

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No 126 of 2026 dated 07/Jan/2026, executed by 1. Maddipati Srinuvasu Rao, 2. Maddipati Prasad and 3. Maddipati Yesu in favour of their Mother, Maddipati Papa, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 72.6 Sq. Yds, located near by house number 2-147, comprised in survey number 120, situated in Kurukuru Village, Devarapalle Mandal, erstwhile West Godavari District, now within the District of East Godavari, registered at Sub-Registrar Office Ananthapalli(501), is bounded as follows: North by: Site of Ainaparthi Rambabu South by: Site of Paluri China Venkatrao East by: Road West by: RCC house of Uppati Sarojini

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
